<a id="class_InputEventJoypadMotion"></a>

# InputEventJoypadMotion

**Inherits:** [InputEvent](class_inputevent.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Represents axis motions (such as joystick or analog triggers) from a gamepad.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Stores information about joystick motions. One **InputEventJoypadMotion** represents one axis at a time. For gamepad buttons, see [InputEventJoypadButton](class_inputeventjoypadbutton.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Using InputEvent](../tutorials/inputs/inputevent.md)

## Property Descriptions

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_axis**\ (\ value\: [JoyAxis](class_@globalscope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_JoyAxis)\ )

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_InputEventJoypadMotion_property_axis_value"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **axis_value** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_InputEventJoypadMotion_property_axis_value)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_axis_value**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_axis_value**\ (\ )

Current position of the joystick on the given axis. The value ranges from ``-1.0`` to ``1.0``. A value of ``0`` means the axis is in its resting position.
